Konradin Metze

Bolsista de Produtividade em Pesquisa do CNPq - Nível 1B

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/7890165105970581
  • Última atualização do currículo em 11/01/2019

CCurriculum vitae Konradin Metze : pathologist. graduated in Medicine, 1981 ( Friedrich-Alexander University, Erlangen, Germany) PhD in 1982 ( thesis : Konzepte einer Pathologie der Hyperosmolarität, supervisor Prof Dr Götz Brandt, Institute of Pathology, Friedrich-Alexander University , Erlangen , Germany). 1982-1984 : Gerhard-Domagk-Institue of Pathology , University of Münster, Germany. 1984-1986 : Institute of Neuropathology , Bethel, Bielefeld, Germany. !986 - 1988 : Institute of Pathology , Klinikum Mannheim, Ruprecht-Karls-Universität, Heidelberg. since 1988 : Department of Pathology, Faculty of Medicine , University of Campinas ( UNICAMP), Brazil; Full professor (professor pleno) of the Postgraduate Course in Medical Pathophysiology ( UNICAMP) Lectures on general and special pathology, scientific methods and biostatistics. Head of the interdisciplinary research group ?Analytical Cellular Pathology? (patologia analítica celular). Research Interests : applying computerized image analysis and new technologies in microcopy. This includes :In particular : 1) Detection of invisible "hidden" information?in routinely prepared cytologic or histologic slides by texture analysis with inhouse developed computer programs based on the concepts of entropy, fractality, co-occurrence matrix etc.; 2..Generation of virtual microscopic images with the contrast created by differences of physicochemical characteristics of tissues, e.g. fluorescence lifetime imaging and multiphoton microscopy (in collaboration with INCT INFABIC) 3. Creation of diagnostic algorithms and prognostic mathematical models based on computerized image analysis or other clinical and laboratory data. . 158 publications indexed in PUBMED, 179 in SCOPUS, 220 in WEBOFKNOWLEDGE ( 155 withou meeting summaries or abstracts) and 277 communications indexed by Google Scholar 2076 citations with Hirsch index h=22 according to WEBOFKNOWLEDGE, 2893 with h=29 according to Google Scholar , and 1584 with h = 24 .Weighted RCR calculated by iCite 74.31 (data from 30.12.2016) Member of the editorial /advisory boards of Cellular Pathology Pathology Research and Practice,; Section Editor of Diagnostic Pathology and Academic Editor of PLOS ONE . Married to Irene Gyöngyver Heidemarie Lorand-Metze. (Texto informado pelo autor) (Texto informado pelo autor)
